title: Pillow
description: black background; embroidered cross stitch border and corner square--green background in red and taupe; center has applied green circle with red embroidery and silver tape; four interior corners embroidered with running stitch circle patterns in green, red, blue
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
